title: Australian Engineers Unveil Breakthrough in Concentrating Solar Thermodynamics - Microgrid Media
summary: A team in Australia has developed a high-temperature solar technology using ceramic particles for enhanced heat capture and storage, potentially aiding in renewable energy solutions for heavy industry and decarbonization efforts.
